Class java.Nutmeg.Set

Nutmeg Class Hierarchy  Method Names





  Class java.Nutmeg.Set



java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.Nutmeg.Collection
           |
           +----java.Nutmeg.Set






  
 public class Set
  
 extends Collection


Copyright (c) 1995, 1996 THOUGHT Inc. All Rights Reserved.

Set class (a growable array).

This class allows for only one occurrence of a given object within
the Set.





  




  
 
	Set(int, int)
  
 Constructor for Set with an initial storage capacity
and a specified growSize.
  
 
	Set(int)
  
 Constructs an empty Set with the specified storage 
capacity, and a default capacity increment.
  
 
	Set()
  
 Construct an empty Set.




  




  
 
	add(Object)
  
 Add an object to the collection.
  
 
	adjustSize()
  
 If collection is over 90% full, then adjust size by increasing
it by the growSize.
  
 
	at(int)
  
 WARNING!
This is not a valid method, because a set is a loose collection and
does not have a fixed access point.
  
 
	atPut(int, Object)
  
 WARNING!
This is not a valid method, because a set is a loose collection and
does not have a fixed access point.
  
 
	clone()
  
 Clone this Set.
  
 
	initialize(int)
  
 (Re)Initialize the dataspace, and set the object count to 0.
  
 
	objectsEqual(Collection)
  
 Return a collection with the objects which match those in aCollection.
  
 
	removeIfAbsent(Object, DoBlock)
  
 Remove object if found, execute doBlock of absent.





  




Set

  public Set(int initialSize,
             int growSize)




  
 Constructor for Set with an initial storage capacity
and a specified growSize.
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 initialSize - initial storage capacity of data storage
    
 growSize - the increment that storage should grow by
size doubles if value is 0.
  




Set

  public Set(int initialSize)




  
 Constructs an empty Set with the specified storage 
capacity, and a default capacity increment.  Capacity increment 
is defaulted to 0 using this constructor.
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 initialSize - initial storage capacity of data storage.
  




Set

  public Set()




  
 Construct an empty Set.  This defaults to an initial 
storage capacity of 10 objects, and a growSize of 0.





  



add

  public synchronized Object add(Object anObject)




  
 Add an object to the collection.
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 anObject - the object to be added to the collection
    
 Returns:
    
 anObject the Object which was added.
    
 Overrides:
    
 add in class Collection
  




adjustSize

  public synchronized void adjustSize()




  
 If collection is over 90% full, then adjust size by increasing
it by the growSize.



at

  public synchronized Object at(int anInt)




  
 WARNING!
This is not a valid method, because a set is a loose collection and
does not have a fixed access point.
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 anInt - the integer position of the object.
    
 Returns:
    
 Object returns null because this is not valid
    
 Overrides:
    
 at in class Collection
  




atPut

  public synchronized Object atPut(int anInt,
                                   Object anObject)




  
 WARNING!
This is not a valid method, because a set is a loose collection and
does not have a fixed access point.
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 anInt - position to put object
    
 anObject - the object to insert
  




objectsEqual

  public synchronized boolean objectsEqual(Collection aCollection)




  
 Return a collection with the objects which match those in aCollection.
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 aCollection - The collection to match.
  




initialize

  public final synchronized void initialize(int initialSize)




  
 (Re)Initialize the dataspace, and set the object count to 0.
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 initialSize - Sets the buffer size of the dataspace.
  




removeIfAbsent

  public synchronized void removeIfAbsent(Object anObject,
                                          DoBlock doBlock)




  
 Remove object if found, execute doBlock of absent.
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 anObject - the Object to insert
    
 doBlock - The DoBlock to execute if anObject not found.
  




clone

  public synchronized Object clone()




  
 Clone this Set. The objects are not cloned.
  

    
 Overrides:
    
 clone in class Collection
